ygData.subject: Re: Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
ygData.msgSnippet: You can increase your throwing skills, but daggers are damn expensive unless you are a magician.
ygData.messageBody:
You can increase your throwing skills, but daggers are damn expensive
unless you are a magician.

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> huh? how come cannot increase? jialatz lah... so unfair... anyway...
> im not talking bout throwing that dagger away lah... just wanna
> improve my throwing if possible... max out all useful skills whenever
> i can... thast all... Nic
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Leshrec
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 3:57 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
> Yeah but I think caster cannot increase throwing skill.
> Anyways, dagger good for increase in mana so why throw it? )
